casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Lee MCNAIR 230P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, Anthony Lee McNair, for McNair, Anthony Lee. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of November 2018 by Defendant for Respond and Reply for Remedy and Relief to the State's:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
